content.raw: I'm actually **NOT** installing **ignitionrobotics**, but just want to compile a **SINGLE** library **ign-cmake**. Clearly, there are quite a lot of libraries at [https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/) that I think each is somewhat related but also independent. I think **ign-cmake** should be able to be manually compiled ????? Is it possible????
